name: Juice Master - Match 3 Juice Shop Puzzle Game
name_original: Juice Master - Match 3 Juice Shop Puzzle Game
description:
Juice Master - Funny Jam Jam Match 3 Game, from the makers of Birds pop mania, Spots Connect, Pastry Jam, Garden Paradise & Halloween Witch Connect.

You’ve just opened a new juice shop bar in town and it’s already getting busy. Crowds of thirty customers are coming through the doors and it’s up to you to make juicy fruit smoothies and serve them as fast as possible.


It’s a fruit matching frenzy with a juicy twist!

🍎 🍊 🍓 🍋 🍒 🍇 🍉 🍑 🍈

⚡ A FRUITY MATCH 3 PUZZLE
You’ll need to match 3 or more of the same fruit to add juice to their glass. When it’s full – the customer is happy! It’s not just about serving customers, it’s about getting the highest score possible and matching as much fruit as possible!

⚡ INSANE FRUIT COMBOS
Match different combinations of fruit to create special fruit with unique powers, such as the explosive fruit mine, X power and special seed. These special combinations are the key to getting huge scores! Combine 2 special fruits to get a master fruit that’ll help you get EPIC scores. It’s the ultimate move on fruit juice making frenzy!

⚡ UNLOCK POWER UPS
Each level gets progressively more difficult and you may need a little help completing the challenging stages. As you level up, you’ll gain access to useful power-ups to help match fruit, make delicious smoothies and have lots of happy customers.

Master the power-ups such as the hammer, knife, mixer and magic wand to help you complete the difficult stages, get huge scores and dominate the leaderboard.

FRUIT MASTER – JUICY FEATURES:
✔ Get daily rewards including money and boosters
✔ 500 challenging levels – more coming soon!
✔ Spin the wheel of fortune to get free rewards every day
✔ Compete for the highest score on the leaderboard
✔ Make juicy smoothies for thirsty customers at the bar
✔ Match 3 or more identical fruits to earn points
✔ Keep matching fruits to fill the customer’s glass
✔ Chain together multiple combinations for huge scores
✔ Match special combinations to create powerful fruits like the fruit mine, X power and
special seed
✔ Match 2 special fruits for the ultimate fruit blasting combo
✔ Earn power-ups as you level up and unlock hammers, knives, mixers, magic wands and
more

With over 500 levels and more being added with every update, Fruit Master gives fans of the classic match 3 game hours of juicy city fun!

👉DOWNLOAD FREE TODAY & JOIN IN THE FRUIT MATCHING FRENZY

📧If you have any questions or need support, please email us at info@launchshipstudios.com
